label: 造東大寺司
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: An agency overseeing the building, furnishing, and other administrative affairs of Tōdaiji Temple, as well as the production of all manuscripts. Within the Tōdaiji Construction Bureau were a large number of smaller offices including the Official Scriptorium (J: Shakyōjo) and Office of Temple Construction (J: Zōbutsu Sho). [写経所、造仏所]
